name: Design Colorful Skirts-Dress Maker
description:
Design Colorful Skirts is a pretty girl dressup and makeup game.
Princess is a huge fashionista and she loves to keep up with all of the latest trends. She is always on the lookout for the most fashionable items and recently, while browsing Pinterest, she has discovered just how amazing glittery skirts are. She would love to own one but she just couldn't find the right one in any of the stores she went through. Nevertheless, she found the perfect solution to own that perfect skirt, making it herself. Have fun playing Design Colorful Skirts!

Game Features:
- Design Colorful Skirts make you never want to stop
- Come and join Design Colorful Skirts
- Comfortable color matching make you better enjoy this game
- Simple operations make you easy to play Design Colorful Skirts
